391:1: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya,
391:3: bhagavānāha–yatkhalu kulaputra mama sadṛśāḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaveyuḥ,
391:5: te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante |
391:6: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
391:7: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi,
391:8: tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum?
391:9: api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta–te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti,
391:13: te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya |
391:14: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate,
391:16: na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate,
391:19: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti,
391:20: yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati–sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti ||
391:21: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat–katamena kālena bhagavato'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati,
391:23: bhagavānāha–bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
391:48: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā rūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati |
391:49: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ deśayati,
